thread.title: no skies subfolder in textures in Q4

post.date: Posted: Fri Sep 22, 2006 11:56 pm Post subject: no skies subfolder in textures in Q4
post.author: blood_thirst
post.body: umm i have a new sky that i want to use but i cant find the folder skies to put it in in the pk4 folders it doesnt exsist but in the editor it does and i can use textures from it i dont understand this any help would be aprictiated

post.date: Posted: Sat Sep 23, 2006 4:39 am Post subject:
post.author: evilartist
post.body: What, you mean where do you put the textures? Or the material shaders? You can put the actual sky textures anywhere you want in the d3 base (or mod) directory, just as long as you call it out correctly in the material shader. I think the MTR file is required to go in the "materials" folder. Any texture assets, though, I think can go anywhere.

post.date: Posted: Sat Sep 23, 2006 5:30 am Post subject:
post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
First, you shouldn't be putting things into the pk4s that come with the game. You can and should create your own pk4.

I suggest you read this...

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Modding

Second, you can't just move images into a specific directory and expect them to work. Doom 3 engine based games use material shaders which in turn reference images and thier locations.

I suggest you read this also...

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Texturing
